title: (x) Playful font ID - Love Ya Like A Sister {Mike Y}
content:
Hello:

Since I can't insert or attach any kind of image, I choose to copy/paste a link to the font in question:

[http://www2.esmas.com/entretenimiento/telenovelas/atrevete-a-sonar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141518/http:/www2.esmas.com/entretenimiento/telenovelas/atrevete-a-sonar/ "http://www2.esmas.com/entretenimiento/telenovelas/atrevete-a-sonar/")

It's the one used on the main menu (Elenco Capitulos Música, etc.)

Thanks!!

Q™ says: It's all about the fonts...
author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content:
I have a feeling this may be a freebie font, but a font that is similar is [Billy Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141518/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sparkytype/billy-serif/).

- Mike Yanega

Yes, it was a freebie. It's [Love Ya Like A Sister](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141518/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/13842?text=noticias) by Kimberly Geswein, who does some nice free fonts.

- Mike Yanega

Mike Yanega, as always, very precise, very accurate, very fast!!

Thanks Mike!!
